title: Bioferia Organic Market
description: Saturday farmers' market with vendors selling a wide range of products including fresh organic fruits, vegetables, grains, nuts, yacon syrup, maca powder, olives, granola, dried fruit. Several pepared food stands. Also wooden toys, jewelry, scarves, and hand-woven textiles, dried herbs for burning or cooking uses.
streetAddress: Parque Reducto, Avenida Benavides, San Antonio, Miraflores
